Website.title: Website Design and Development
Website.sub_title: Impress your customers with a website that works
Website.description: For individuals, businesses and entrepreneurs, we design, develop and maintain websites that serve your purpose.

full_description.point1: Step-by-step approach to understand what you have in mind
full_description.point2: You will get a website that meets and serves your business purpose, and deliver value for your customers
full_description.point3: You will get monthly  information about your customers who visited your website and the activities they are engage in
full_description.point4: We will maintain and optimize your website with your latest information and integrate it with emerging technologies

Website.right_web_content1: Get a website that makes your customers happy to revisit
Website.right_web_content2: Get a website that match and serves your business needs
Website.right_web_content3: Get a website that makes your customers happy to revisit
Website.right_web_content4: Upgrade your existing website and add new features of your choice

Know about the
Number of visitors
Activities of visitors

AppDev.title: App Development
AppDev.sub_title: Keep your customers close with your mobile App
AppDev.description: We design, develop and maintain Android and ios apps that meet and serve your business needs.
AppDev.right_app_content1: Share your idea, we will get you the App
AppDev.right_app_content2: We do both web and mobile Apps
AppDev.right_app_content3: We design, develop and maintain your App for as long as you want

ICT.title: ICT
ICT.sub_title: Pay and only use what you need
ICT.description: Tailor your Information and Communication Technology solutions to support your business growth.
ICT.right_ICT_content1: Reduce your IT support cost by using cloud technologies, pay for what you use

right_ICT_content2.bullet1: • Your IT infrastructure in the hands of reliable IT professionals
right_ICT_content2.bullet2: • We design,  implement and manage LAN and WAN Networks

ICT.right_ICT_heading4: Lease Cloud services at affordable cost

right_ICT_content4.bullet7: • Have your IT cloud infrastructure designed and managed by professionals
right_ICT_content4.bullet8: • Increase your security by leasing anti-virus services

DigitalMkt.title: Digital & Social Media Marketing
DigitalMkt.sub_title: Create a digital identity and mindset for your products, services or business that attracts customers
DigitalMkt.description: Are you wondering how you can make your website popular or what can you do to attract and retain more users.
DigitalMkt.right_dm_content2: know how many people visited your website today
DigitalMkt.right_dm_content3: Create a social media identity for your business

Multimedia.title: Multimedia & Graphics Design
Multimedia.sub_title: Designs that resonate with your needs
Multimedia.description: The best media and designs experiences are built by TeCloud Platform. We build you your desire.
Multimedia.right_mul_content1: Flyers that suit your Facebook, YouTube, LinkedIn, Twitter, instagram business pages

Multimedia.right_mul_content4: Concept development for reality shows, Video shooting, editing etc.

Inncubation.title: Incubation Hub
Inncubation.sub_title: We translate your ideas into innovative products or services
Inncubation.description: We believe that there are people who have great ideas but lack the resources and skills to transform those ideas.
Inncubation.right_innc_content1: Your ideas are yours, we just help turn them into innovations for you

right_innc_content2.bullet1: • Confidentiality and right to your idea

Innovation.title: Innovation Hub
Innovation.sub_title: Become an IT and software development professional
Innovation.description: Add value to what you do by joining an agile team to increase your professionalism and love for what you do. You can join any of our teams, designers, IT, developers or product managers to learn the skills required to become a professional.
Innovation.right_inno_content1: Develop and internalize a mindset appropriate for software development by joining one of our teams
Innovation.right_inno_content2: Learn how to code from scratch, no prerequisites and interact with experienced developers
Innovation.right_inno_content3: An opportunity to work in real life projects and put your skills to work
